ChangeDescriptions.ChangeDescription: Version 2.36: Renamed the 'TransferToLinkFailureLogic' process in the TransferNode process logic to 'TransferFailureLogic'. If the 'AutoTransferOnEntry' property value of the TransferNode is 'To Parent External Node' and the transfer to the specified parent external node fails, then the token now executes the 'TransferFailureLogic' process.
Version 2.37: Changed 'Capacity' display name to 'Initial Capacity' as object capacities are now user assignable.
Version 2.38: The RoutingGroup element named 'RoutingOut' that is owned by the TransferNode is now a private element.

Version 2.39: Updated the TransferNode object process logic to specify all of the object's process delays as non-interruptible. For the 'Select From List' feature to set an entity's next destination, changed the default value of the destination 'Selection Expression' property to be 'Candidate.Node.InputLocation.Overload'.
Version 2.40: In the object process logic, the 'Action' property for all Execute steps executing an 'add-on process' is now specified as 'WaitUntilCompleted'.
Version 2.41: Minor property description and display name updates. The RoutingGroup element named 'RoutingOut' that is owned by the TransferNode is now a public element.
Version 3.42: Changes related to setting the 'Token Associated Object Destroyed Action' option for process logic in this object.
Version 3.44: 'SeizedObjects.UnitsOwned' function renamed to 'SeizedObjects.CapacityUnitsOwned'.
Version 3.47: Added new 'Appearance' property category.
Version 3.48: Hide new 'Random Number Stream' property in 'Routing Logic' category.
Version 3.49: Specified the 'OnAssociatedObjectTransferRequested' property of some processes as 'EndProcess'.

Version 3.54: Added new Notify step to 'TransferFailureLogic' process to output a warning if automatically destroying an entity. Conversion to 'OnRunInitialized' standard interface process. Added 'Run Ending' add-on process trigger.
Version 3.56: Added new 'Tally Statistics' property category.
Version 3.57: Change to new 'OnEnteredParking' standard interface process that was added to Simio's base node object.

Version 4.58: Removed 'AutoTransferOnEntry' property. The 'ExternalNodeName' property is now always visible with display name 'Bound External Output Node'. If a transfer to parent external node attempt fails, then the token now continues normal processing instead of executing the 'TransferFailureLogic'. Added new 'Advanced Options' property category. Added 'OnEnteredToAssociatedObject' process logic.
Version 4.59: Changed the default of the 'Blocked Routing Rule' property to 'Select Available Only'.
Version 4.60: Process logic now uses new object 'SeizedResources.CapacityUnitsOwned' function instead of deprecated 'SeizedObjects.CapacityUnitsOwned'.
Version 4.61: Set all inherited properties in 'Financials' category to not be visible.
Version 4.63: Set all inherited properties in 'Financials->Resource Costs' to not be visible.
Version 4.65: Process logic now uses new object 'SeizedResources.CapacityOwnedOf' function instead of deprecated 'SeizedResources.CapacityUnitsOwned'.

Version 4.66: If bound to an external output node of the parent model, a transfer node's 'Entered' event is still fired and its 'Entered' add-on process trigger still executed before transferring the entity out of the parent model.

Version 4.68: The TransferNode object is no longer enabled as a resource object, and the 'InitialCapacity', 'RankingRule', and 'RankingExpression' properties have been replaced by equivalent 'InitialTravelerCapacity', 'EntryRankingRule', and 'EntryRankingExpression' properties. Renamed 'InitializedAddOnProcess' property to 'RunInitializedAddOnProcess'. Renamed 'ExternalNodeName' property to 'BoundExternalOutputNode'.

Version 4.70: The blocked condition for the 'RoutingOut' RoutingGroup element owned by the node now uses new node 'AssociatedStation' and 'NumberTravelers.RoutingInToEnterAssociatedObject' functions. For the 'Select From List' feature to set an entity's next destination, changed the default value of the destination 'Selection Expression' property to be 'Candidate.Node.AssociatedStationOverload'.

Version 4.71: Renamed 'BlockedRoutingRule' property to 'BlockedDestinationRule'. Changed the default value of the transporter 'Selection Expression' property to be 'Candidate.Transporter.RideStationOverload'.

Version 4.73: New 'Random Number Stream' property now available in the 'Advanced Options' category. Renamed 'NodeName' property to 'DestinationNodeName'. Renamed 'NodeListName' property to 'DestinationNodeListName'.

Version 4.74: If a traveler is attempting to transfer out of the node and has no network assigned (i.e., is using free space for travel), then the node's process logic now transfers the traveler into free space.
Version 4.75: If the 'Routing Logic -> Entity Destination Type' property is specified as'Specific', can now specify the new destination node value as 'No Destination'.
Version 4.77: Removed an unnecessary 'TransferFailureLogic' Execute step from the 'OnEnteredToAssociatedObject' process logic.
Version 5.87: Process logic now uses new property 'HasValue' function instead of deprecated 'IsDefined'.

Version 5.91: Transport Logic -> 'Transporter Type' property -> The 'From List' choice is now displayed as 'Select From List'. Added information to indicate which properties to display if the new 'Show Commonly Used Properties Only' option is enabled.
Version 6.103: Some property description updates.
Version 6.106: Added new 'Use Custom Routing Group' choice for the 'Entity Destination Type' property.
Version 7.122: 'RoutingOutLogic' process - The Fire step that fires the node's 'RiderWaiting' event is now executed before the Ride step instead of after.
Version 7.123: Transport Logic -> Added new 'Keep Reserved' transporter status option on entity drop-off if riding on a transporter.
Version 7.130: Renamed 'RandomNumberStream' property to 'BranchingRandomNumberStream'

Version 7.131: Added new 'Routing Logic -> Other Routing Out Options' property category with possible 'Required Materials', 'Route Request Ranking Rule', 'Route Request Dynamic Selection Rule', & 'Branching Random Number Stream' properties.
Version 8.133 'OnEntered' process logic no longer requires a Decide 'IfFreeSpaceTraveler' step. Added 'State Assignments' property category.
Version 8.134 'Routing Logic -> Other Routing Out Options -> Random Number Stream' property now inherited from the base node definition
Version 8.137 'TransferFailureLogic' now gives warning notification if automatically parking entity.
Version 8.141 Added new 'Lot ID' property to 'Required Materials' repeat group.
Version 8.147: Property description string updates.
Version 8.158: Step label updates.
Version 9.161: Property description string updates.
Version 9.164: Property description string updates.
Version 10.174: Added 'None (Destroy Entity)' option to EntityDestinationType property.
Version 10.175: Added Other Routing Out Options -> Required Materials -> InventorySiteType & SiteObjectName properties.
Version 11.193: Other Routing Out Options -> Required Materials -> Optional 'Lot ID' property if required material from an inventory site.
Version 11.203: Added 'Route Constraint Logic' property.
Version 12.212: Renamed 'TalliesOnEnteringValue' property to 'TalliesOnEnteringValueExpression'. Renamed 'TalliesOnExitedValue' property to 'TalliesOnExitedValueExpression'.

Version 14.231: RideOnTransporter property changed to list property with possible values Always, Never, or Conditional. Renamed TransporterSelectionExpression property to TransporterSelectionValueExpression.
Version 14.232: Property value transformation data added to convert old RideOnTransporter property from boolean to list property.
Version 15.241: Added Routing Logic capabilities to 'Specific' and 'BySequence' Entity Destination Types.
Version 15.256: Added option to specify a path planner to conditionally use when transferring to an outbound link.
Version 16.258: Renamed DestinationSelectionExpression property to DestinationSelectionValueExpression.
Version 18.270: RequiredMaterialConsumptionType property changes.

Category.Name: Transport Logic/Transporter Status On Drop-Off
Category.Description: Transporter Status Options On Entity Drop-Off

ListProperty.Name: DestinationType
ListProperty.Description:
The method used to set a destination node for entities exiting the transfer node.
If the method is 'By Sequence', then the entity must have a sequence table assigned. The destination node value will be set to the next destination in the sequence.
Either the ‘Select From List’ or ‘Use Custom Routing Group’ methods may be used to route an entity to a location selected from a list of possible destination nodes. Note that the custom routing group approach can be particularly useful if it is desirable to have a single logical queue for entities waiting to be routed that is shared between multiple transfer node locations. Refer to the Routing Group element for more information.

NodeProperty.Name: DestinationNodeName
NodeProperty.Description: The name of the specific node that is the destination.

NodeListProperty.Name: DestinationNodeListName
NodeListProperty.Description: Identifies the list of possible destination nodes.

ElementProperty.Name: DestinationRoutingGroupName
ElementProperty.Description:
The name of the Routing Group element that will be used to route each entity to a location selected from a list of possible destination nodes.
Go to Definitions->Elements to add a new Routing Group element to the model.

EnumProperty.Name: DestinationSelectionGoal
EnumProperty.Description: The goal used to select a destination if there are multiple candidates available in the list of possible destination nodes.

ExpressionProperty.Name: DestinationSelectionValueExpression
ExpressionProperty.Description:
The expression used to get the value for each candidate destination node.
In the expression, use the syntax Candidate.[NodeClass].[Attribute] or Candidate.[NodeAssociatedObjectClass].[Attribute] to evaluate attributes of either the candidate destination nodes themselves or the objects associated with those candidate nodes (e.g., Candidate.Node.AssociatedStation.Capacity or Candidate.Server.Capacity).

ExpressionProperty.Name: DestinationSelectionCondition
ExpressionProperty.Description:
Optional condition evaluated for each candidate destination node that must be true for the node to be selected.
In the expression, use the syntax Candidate.[NodeClass].[Attribute] or Candidate.[NodeAssociatedObjectClass].[Attribute] to reference an attribute of either the candidate destination nodes themselves or the objects associated with those candidate nodes (e.g., Candidate.Node.AssociatedStation.Capacity or Candidate.Server.Capacity).

EnumProperty.Name: BlockedDestinationRule
EnumProperty.Description:
The rule used to manage destination selection if there are one or more candidates in the list of possible destination nodes that have no space available.
If the rule is 'Select Any', then whether or not a destination is blocked will be ignored.
If the rule is 'Select Available Only', then only a destination that is not currently blocked may be assigned, and if all possible destinations are blocked then an entity will be held at the TransferNode until a destination becomes available.
If the rule is 'Prefer Available', then a destination that is not currently blocked will be preferred, but if all possible destinations are blocked then the best destination per the selection goal will still be immediately assigned.

RepeatingProperty.Name: RouteConstraintLogic
RepeatingProperty.Description: Constraint logic used to enforce additional constraints on an entity’s request to be assigned a destination.

ElementProperty.Name: RouteConstraintLogicName
ElementProperty.Description: The name of the Constraint Logic element used to enforce additional constraints on an entity’s route request.

EnumProperty.Name: RouteRequestRankingRule
EnumProperty.Description: The static rule used to rank competing entities waiting to be assigned an available destination.

ExpressionProperty.Name: RouteRequestRankingExpression
ExpressionProperty.Description: The expression used with a Smallest Value First or Largest Value First ranking rule.

SelectionRuleProperty.Name: RouteRequestDynamicSelectionRule
SelectionRuleProperty.Description: The rule used to dynamically select an entity from competing requests waiting to be assigned an available destination.

ElementProperty.Name: PathPlannerName
ElementProperty.Description:
The name of the Path Planner element used by an entity to find and reserve a network deadlock-free shortest path from this node to its destination node.
NOTE: If path planning is used by an entity then the Outbound Link Preference and Outbound Link Rule properties are ignored.

ListProperty.Name: RideOnTransporter
ListProperty.Description: Indicates whether an entity must ride a transporter to exit the transfer node.

ExpressionProperty.Name: RideOnTransporterCondition
ExpressionProperty.Description: The condition expression indicating whether an entity must ride a transporter to exit the transfer node.

EnumProperty.Name: TransporterType
EnumProperty.Description: The method for specifying the transporter object to ride.

ObjectInstanceProperty.Name: TransporterName
ObjectInstanceProperty.Description: The name of the transporter object to ride.

TransporterListProperty.Name: TransporterListName
TransporterListProperty.Description: The name of the transporter list from which to select the transporter object to ride.

EnumProperty.Name: TransporterReservationMethod
EnumProperty.Description:
The type of reservation method used to select a transporter object to ride.
Reserve Closest - Reserve the transporter that is closest to the transfer node. The rule used to break ties is the specified selection goal.
Reserve Best - Reserve the transporter using the specified selection goal. The rule used to break ties is the transporter that is closest to the transfer node.
First Available At Location - Can only select a transporter that is already located at the transfer node. The rule used to break ties is the specified selection goal.

EnumProperty.Name: TransporterSelectionGoal
EnumProperty.Description: The rule used in conjunction with the specified reservation method to select a transporter object from multiple candidates.

ExpressionProperty.Name: TransporterSelectionValueExpression
ExpressionProperty.Description:
The expression used to get the value for each candidate transporter.
In the expression, use the syntax Candidate.[TransporterClass].[Attribute] to reference an attribute of the candidate transporter objects (e.g., Candidate.Transporter.RideStation.Capacity).

ExpressionProperty.Name: TransporterSelectionCondition
ExpressionProperty.Description:
Optional condition evaluated for each candidate transporter that must be true for the transporter to be selected.
In the expression, use the syntax Candidate.[TransporterClass].[Attribute] to reference an attribute of the candidate transporter objects (e.g., Candidate.Transporter.RideStation.Capacity).

ExpressionProperty.Name: TransporterStatusOnDropOffKeepReservedCondition
ExpressionProperty.Description:
Optional condition indicating whether, on drop-off, to keep the transporter resource reserved for possible later reuse by the same entity. Other entities will be unable to use the reserved transporter for processing tasks or new ride pickup requests unless the reservation is cancelled.
This condition is evaluated when the entity is picked up at the TransferNode. In the expression, use the syntax Entity.CurrentTransporter.[Attribute] to reference an attribute of the selected transporter (e.g., Entity.CurrentTransporter.Is.Vehicle1).
Note that when an entity is attempting to select a resource from a group of candidates (e.g., from a list or from a population of some resource type), by default a preference will be given to select a resource that has already been reserved by that entity irrespective of the specified selection goal.
Leaving this property blank (no condition) is equivalent to entering False.

RepeatingProperty.Name: AssignmentsOnEntering
RepeatingProperty.Description: Optional state assignments when an entity is entering the object.

ListProperty.Name: AssignmentsOnEnteringAssignConditionType
ListProperty.Description: Condition required to perform the assignment.

ExpressionProperty.Name: AssignmentsOnEnteringAssignCondition
ExpressionProperty.Description: The condition required to perform the assignment.

StateProperty.Name: AssignmentsOnEnteringStateVariableName
StateProperty.Description: Name of the state variable that will be assigned a new value.

RepeatingProperty.Name: TalliesOnEntering
RepeatingProperty.Description: Optional tally statistics to record when an entity is entering the node.

ListProperty.Name: TalliesOnEnteringTallyConditionType
ListProperty.Description: Condition required to record the tally statistic.

ExpressionProperty.Name: TalliesOnEnteringTallyCondition
ExpressionProperty.Description: The condition required to record the tally statistic.

ElementProperty.Name: TalliesOnEnteringTallyStatisticName
ElementProperty.Description: The name of the tally statistic for which to record an observation value.

EnumProperty.Name: TalliesOnEnteringValueType
EnumProperty.Description:
The type of observation value to record.
If the value type is 'Expression', then the value of the specified expression is recorded.
If the value type is 'TimeBetween', then the time since the last entity arrival to this or any other Tally step referencing the tally statistic is recorded.

ExpressionProperty.Name: TalliesOnEnteringValueExpression
ExpressionProperty.Description: The expression returning the value to be recorded.

RepeatingProperty.Name: TalliesOnExited
RepeatingProperty.Description: Optional tally statistics to record when an entity has exited the node.

ListProperty.Name: TalliesOnExitedTallyConditionType
ListProperty.Description: Condition required to record the tally statistic.

ExpressionProperty.Name: TalliesOnExitedTallyCondition
ExpressionProperty.Description: The condition required to record the tally statistic.

ElementProperty.Name: TalliesOnExitedTallyStatisticName
ElementProperty.Description: The name of the tally statistic for which to record an observation value.

EnumProperty.Name: TalliesOnExitedValueType
EnumProperty.Description:
The type of observation value to record.
If the value type is 'Expression', then the value of the specified expression is recorded.
If the value type is 'TimeBetween', then the time since the last entity arrival to this or any other Tally step referencing the tally statistic is recorded.

ExpressionProperty.Name: TalliesOnExitedValueExpression
ExpressionProperty.Description: The expression returning the value to be recorded.

ElementProperty.Name: RunInitializedAddOnProcess
ElementProperty.Description: Occurs when the simulation run is initialized.

ElementProperty.Name: RunEndingAddOnProcess
ElementProperty.Description: Occurs when the simulation run is ending.

ElementProperty.Name: EnteredAddOnProcess
ElementProperty.Description: Occurs when an entity's leading edge has entered this node.

ElementProperty.Name: ExitedAddOnProcess
ElementProperty.Description: Occurs when an entity's trailing edge has exited this node.

ExternalNodeProperty.Name: BoundExternalOutputNode
ExternalNodeProperty.Description: The name of an external output node that this node has been bound to in order to transfer entities out of the containing (parent) object. The transfer attempt will be performed by an entity after entering the node and, if successful, any other crossing or routing logic for the node will be ignored.

RepeatingProperty.Name: RoutingOutRequiredMaterials
RepeatingProperty.Description:
Additional material availability constraints enforced on an entity's route request.
NOTE: This repeat group has been deprecated. Use the Routing Logic -> Other Routing Options -> Route Constraint Logic property instead. To edit the deprecated repeat group, go to File -> Settings -> GUI and set the Display Deprecated Properties in Properties Window value to True.

EnumProperty.Name: RequiredMaterialConsumptionType
EnumProperty.Description:
The type of material consumption.
Material – A single material.
BillOfMaterials – A list of component materials.

EnumProperty.Name: RequiredMaterialInventorySiteType
EnumProperty.Description:
Indicates the fixed object that is the inventory location. Applies only to material elements whose Location Based Inventory property is set to True.
The 'ParentObject' setting may be used to indicate that the inventory site is the server, combiner, or separator.

ObjectInstanceProperty.Name: RequiredMaterialSiteObjectName
ObjectInstanceProperty.Description: The name of the fixed object that is the inventory location.

ExpressionProperty.Name: RequiredMaterialQuantity
ExpressionProperty.Description: The quantity of the material or parent assembly.

ExpressionProperty.Name: RequiredMaterialLotID
ExpressionProperty.Description: Optional string value indicating the lot identifier of the material or parent assembly.

Override.Name: InitialTravelerCapacity
Override.Description:
The initial maximum number of traveling entities that may simultaneously occupy this node.
NOTE: An entity using the 'Ride On Transporter' option at this transfer node will be exempted from being blocked by or counted against the node's traveler capacity limit. Also, refer to the user-assignable ‘CurrentTravelerCapacity’ state variable of a node to dynamically change its traveler capacity during a simulation run.

Event.Name: Entered
Event.Description: The Entered event provides notification that an entity has entered the node.

Event.Name: Exited
Event.Description: The Exited event provides notification that an entity has exited the node.

Event.Name: RiderWaiting
Event.Description: The RiderWaiting event provides notification that an entity has entered the RidePickupQueue of the node waiting for a ride.

Element.Name: RoutingOut
Element.Description: Element holding 'Select From List' routing out logic for this TransferNode object.
